availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned
Depth of the list, may be:SELF, SUBUSER, ALL
Provide several dedicated users IDs for which the respective subusers will be queried
If several users are stated you can specify the userdepth (SELF or SUBUSER) for each user individually. If not stated the standard value SELF will be chosen
List shows only users of given subuser
If INVOICERECIPIENT is stated only users that are recipients of invoices are returned
Search for minimum created date of user
Search for maximum created date of user
Search for minimum updated date of user
Search for maximum updated date of user
Search for users for which the ID matches this regular expression
Search for certain account VAT, e.g. 19.00
